popt4jlib.MSSC
Interface ClustererTerminationIntf

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove, ClustererTerminationNoMove, ClustererTerminationNumIters
public interface ClustererTerminationIntf

Interface defines the methods that must be supported by any class that will specify termination criteria for a clusterer algorithm.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou

 boolean isDone()
          return true only when the ClustererIntf object that has registered with this object, satisfies the criterion specified by this object.

Method Detail

isDone

public boolean isDone()
return true only when the ClustererIntf object that has registered with this object, satisfies the criterion specified by this object.

Returns:
boolean

registerClustering

public void registerClustering(ClustererIntf problem)
register with a specific clusterer (implementing the ClustererIntf). The clusterVectors() method of the clusterer must then check with this object's isDone() method to see whether the clustering process can stop.

Parameters:
problem - ClustererIntf
